name: Crash Bandicoot 4: N. Hanced
storyline: A thorough revamp of the completion system, collectibles, and level designs, including removing N.Verted mode, toned down hidden crates, improved crate puzzles, new relic times and quality of life improvements.
summary: A mod for Crash 4 designed to make completion and general gameplay more fair and more fun. It aims to fix the flaws and weaker elements of the completion system and level designs to make the game into a better version of itself.
